about_the_game:
This Pack Features

  • 5 original music tracks by plasterbrain in FLAC and MP3 formats
  • Instructions on where to find all the other music tracks
  • Concept art
  • CG art as seen in-game
  • Character art as seen in-game, old and new
  • 8 images in 4K resolution that you can use as wallpapers
  • Maps of in-game locations
  • Commentary by the devs
  • Some extra stuff

Please Note

The files contained in this DLC provide no in-game content nor enriching life experiences, just some random cool stuff to look at for like 5 minutes. Please only buy this if you're interested in supporting the developers of Project Kat / Paper Lily.

Spoiler Warning

It is recommended that you finish Project Kat before looking at these files.

How to Open

You'll find the files in a folder called "EXTRA", accessible by right clicking Project Kat in your library and selecting Manage → Browse Local Files

name: Project Kat - Supporter Pack
